page.title: 10Ecology.
page.content: {Vegetation_}The salt and prevailing winds play a great part in determining the vegetation of{Tintagel.}The prevailing wind bends the trees and the salt means that{Tintagel}has very few trees.There are few evergreen trees in the area and deciduous trees grow in Rocky Valley and St.Nectan's Glen.{Birds_}Until recently there were Puffins on the cliffs.There was also a Peregrin Falcon but because of publicity it was frightened away.{ {Tintagel}also has hawks,buzzards, kestrels,cormorants,sparrow hawks and lapwings.{Animals_}There are grey seals around the coast,foxes and badgers on the cliffs.Other animals in our area include hedgehogs and rabbits.
